fn.p: The following information was supplied regarding data availability:

Raw data is available in Table S3, which provides our raw isotope, elemental, and climate data. All specimens used in isotope analysis are stored in the University of Michigan’s Earth Systems Lab (of Dr. Ingrid Hendy and Dr. Nathan Sheldon) within the Earth and Environmental Science Department. The living (or former) trees sampled are located at the provided locations in Table S3 Column D, “Original tree location” (GPS columns J and K “Latitude” and “Longitude” respectively), and the residence of the herbaria collections is listed in Table S3 column E “Source.”
